subject: p18338007
History: Chronic heart failure, persistent hypoxia, evaluation.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no relevant change. Massive elevation of the left hemidiaphragm with subsequent basal areas of atelectasis. Borderline size of the cardiac silhouette. No pneumonia or other acute changes. No pleural effusions.
